elements.contents:
Cy-Ops
Saturday, February 26, 2022

Propaganda - Russia - Ukraine

As Ukrainian forces fight to defend Kyiv against Russian aggression, a parallel digital battle is underway. If cryptocurrencies allow nation states to sidestep economic sanctions, how will we apply diplomatic pressure in the future?

MORE

Dego Finance - REKT
Thursday, February 10, 2022

Dego Finance - Cocos-BSX - REKT

$10M taken from Dego Finance and their partner Cocos-BCX. Dego have claimed this to be a case of compromised keys, leaving us wondering, why didn't they use a multi-sig?

MORE

Superfluid - REKT
Wednesday, February 9, 2022

Superfluid - REKT

$8.7M drained from Superfluid. The crypto streaming protocol was exploited by an anonymous attacker, causing collateral damage to several other DAO's.

MORE

Meter - REKT
Monday, February 7, 2022

Meter - Hundred - REKT

Building bridges is a dangerous business. Another attack sees $4.4M taken from Meter.io on BSC, making Hundred Finance lose $3.3M in collateral damage.

MORE

Wormhole - REKT
Thursday, February 3, 2022

Wormhole - Solana - REKT

Wormhole had a loophole... A hacker distorted the fabric of Solana's space-time, netting $326M in the process. How did Wormhole return so much ETH so fast?

MORE

Qubit Finance - REKT
Friday, January 28, 2022

Qubit Finance - BSC - REKT

In other news... Qubit Finance, a protocol by the team behind repeat offender PancakeBunny, has fallen victim to an $80M exploit. But will anyone remember this next week?

MORE

Sifu Scandal
Friday, January 28, 2022

0xSifu - Sesta - Wonderland

All funds are Sifu. An on-chain sleuth discovered that all was not well in Sesta's Wonderland, and the impacts of Quadriga are far from forgotten.

MORE

Crypto.com - REKT
Wednesday, January 19, 2022

CEX - REKT

Another CEX rekt, but they have yet to admit it. ~$33.7M taken, hundreds of users affected, and Crypto.com are still claiming that "funds are safe".

MORE

Airdrop Hunters II
Saturday, January 15, 2022

Airdrop

There’s money to be made in giving money away. Recent airdrops have gained huge amounts of attention. But can the coin creators create a lasting community with no real product of their own?

MORE

LCX - REKT
Monday, January 10, 2022

CEX - CeFi - LCX - REKT

Nothing to see here… Another CEX rekt, $7.94M stolen. The USP of centralised finance grows smaller by the day.

MORE

Arbix Finance - REKT
Tuesday, January 4, 2022

Arbix Finance - REKT

New year, old news. Rug pulls are common on Binance Smart Chain; we’re only mentioning this one because it was larger than most. ~$10 million taken, and Arbix Finance are nowhere to be seen.

MORE

Visor Finance - REKT
Wednesday, December 22, 2021

Visor Finance - REKT

It is the season of giving, and Visor Finance is going all in. Visor allowed an anonymous actor to mint $8.2M in VISR.

MORE
